Mentor Guide: A mentor can guide up to 3 mentees simultaneously. As a Mantee levels, the Mentor will receive a mail containing a Mentee Coin. This can be exchanged for item after awakening. The Mentee Coin can be recived in the mail when the Mentee reaches Lv. 40, 52, 61, 76, and 85. After receiving the Mentee Coin and successfully placing it in your inventory, delete the mail. If your mailbox gets full, you won't be able to receive any more mails. When a Mentor and Mentee are both online, the Mentor can receive a powerful buff and the Mentee can receive XP and an SP bonus buff.
